701639f-a.text:
Post Road, at the N.W. corner of West 232nd Street.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

701640f-a.text:
Post Road (houses thereon), at West 252nd Street, showing two frame dwellings facing on the west side of the thoroughfare on either side of the latter street. The view is westward from the west side of Broadway.

July 18, 1935

P.L. Sperr
